TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CNNpp:ref

I think someone just jumped the gun on posting that it was available in the live updates section when it really was not, or at least not for all people.   it was there when I checked later.

It is a good idea to let whoever posts that sort of thing that a little note saying to check later if it is not there would save everyone some time.   I would not have opened the ticket and you would not have had to deal with one.

you can close this.

thanks

- Verónica
